article_title: Christensen: Documentary 'Woodhouse Divided' is tale of two Raleigh brothers
article_text: Many families are divided over politics, with husbands and wives, brothers and sisters, parents and children, wondering where their kin went so wrong. But consider the perplexity facing Joyce Woodhouse of Raleigh, who raised her two boys, Brad and Dallas, exactly the same. The fraternal fight is the subject of an engaging one-hour documentary, called "Woodhouse Divided."
